item.title: Algorithms Chapter 2
item.description: This time the video is about selection sort. I’m fine with arrays and linked lists so far(I think I’m goin to use it in the future) and with selection sort, too, just bubble sort and selection sort are so similar. By the way, I need to say that I’m enjoying this book really much and until now, it has been my favorite book about anything that has to do with knowledge. It seems like I get to know more things from nowhere while reading a comic book. The pictures are nice!

item.title: Algorithms Chapter 1
item.description: Hello! I said that ‘I’m presently reding a book about algorithms’, which is true! That book is just like a comic book named ‘grokking - algorithms’. The cover is mice. it’s real fun with my dad. You can try it with your parents. You can also try and explore yourself. You’ll soon find yourself becoming more and more familiar with stuff.
